MCQs.question: What was a key factor in the collapse of the Fish Reserve Notes in Sinopia?
options: B) Over-issuing of currency and unsustainable fiscal policies
MCQs.answer: B) Over-issuing of currency and unsustainable fiscal policies

options: B) Stock market crash and banking crisis
MCQs.answer: B) Stock market crash and banking crisis
